00017 #include "MisrFileQuery.h"
00018 #include "MisrUtil.h"
00019 #include "MisrError.h"
00020 #include <hdf.h>
00021 #include <string.h>
00022 #include <stdlib.h>
00023 
00024 
00040 MTKt_status MtkFileBlockMetaList(
00041   const char *filename, 
00042   int *nblockmeta, 
00043   char ***blockmetalist  )
00044 {
00045   MTKt_status status_code; /* Return status of this function */
00046   MTKt_status status;      /* Return status */
00047   intn hdf_status;
00048   int32 file_id = FAIL;
00049   
00050   if (filename == NULL)
00051     MTK_ERR_CODE_JUMP(MTK_NULLPTR);
00052   
00053   /* Open HDF File */
00054   file_id = HDFopen(filename, DFACC_READ, 0);
00055   if (file_id == FAIL)
00056     MTK_ERR_CODE_JUMP(MTK_HDF_HDFOPEN_FAILED);
00057 
00058   /* Read list of block metadata structures. */
00059   status = MtkFileBlockMetaListFid(file_id, nblockmeta, blockmetalist);
00060   MTK_ERR_COND_JUMP(status);
00061 
00062   /* Close HDF file */
00063   hdf_status = HDFclose(file_id);
00064   if (hdf_status == FAIL)
00065     MTK_ERR_CODE_JUMP(MTK_HDF_HDFCLOSE_FAILED);
00066   file_id = FAIL;
00067     
00068   return MTK_SUCCESS;
00069   
00070 ERROR_HANDLE:
00071   if (file_id != FAIL)
00072     HDFclose(file_id);
00073   
00074   return status_code;
00075 }
00076 
00082 MTKt_status MtkFileBlockMetaListFid(
00083   int32 file_id,   
00084   int *nblockmeta, 
00085   char ***blockmetalist  )
00086 {
00087   MTKt_status status_code; /* Return status of this function */
00088   /*MTKt_status status;*/      /* Return status */
00089   intn hdf_status;
00090   int32 vdata_ref = FAIL;
00091   int32 vdata_id = FAIL;
00092   char vdata_name[VSNAMELENMAX + 1];
00093   char **temp_list = NULL;
00094   int temp_count = 0;
00095   int temp_list_max = 5;
00096   int i;
00097   int vstart_active = 0;
00098   
00099   if (nblockmeta == NULL || blockmetalist == NULL)
00100     MTK_ERR_CODE_JUMP(MTK_NULLPTR);
00101   
00102   /* Initialize the vdata interface */
00103   hdf_status = Vstart(file_id);
00104   if (hdf_status == FAIL)
00105     MTK_ERR_CODE_JUMP(MTK_HDF_VSTART_FAILED);
00106   vstart_active = 1;
00107   
00108   temp_list = (char**)calloc(temp_list_max, sizeof(char*));
00109   if (temp_list == NULL)
00110     MTK_ERR_CODE_JUMP(MTK_CALLOC_FAILED);
00111         
00112   /* Search through file for vdatas */
00113   vdata_ref = VSgetid(file_id, vdata_ref);
00114   while (vdata_ref != FAIL)
00115   {
00116     vdata_id = VSattach(file_id, vdata_ref, "r");
00117     if (vdata_id == FAIL)
00118       MTK_ERR_CODE_JUMP(MTK_HDF_VSATTACH_FAILED);
00119     
00120     hdf_status = VSgetname(vdata_id, vdata_name);
00121     if (hdf_status == FAIL)
00122       MTK_ERR_CODE_JUMP(MTK_HDF_VSGETNAME_FAILED);
00123     
00124     if (strstr(vdata_name,"Metadata") != NULL && strstr(vdata_name,"Block") != NULL)
00125     {
00126       if (temp_list_max == temp_count)
00127       {
00128         temp_list_max += 5;
00129         temp_list = (char**)realloc(temp_list,temp_list_max);
00130         if (temp_list == NULL)
00131           MTK_ERR_CODE_JUMP(MTK_REALLOC_FAILED);
00132       }
00133 
00134       temp_list[temp_count] = (char*)malloc((strlen(vdata_name) + 1) *
00135                                              sizeof(char));
00136       if (temp_list[temp_count] == NULL)
00137         MTK_ERR_CODE_JUMP(MTK_MALLOC_FAILED);
00138 
00139       strcpy(temp_list[temp_count],vdata_name);
00140       ++temp_count;
00141     }
00142   
00143     hdf_status = VSdetach(vdata_id);
00144     if (hdf_status == FAIL)
00145       MTK_ERR_CODE_JUMP(MTK_HDF_VSDETACH_FAILED);
00146     vdata_id = FAIL;
00147   
00148     vdata_ref = VSgetid(file_id, vdata_ref);
00149   }
00150   
00151   /* End access to the vdata interface */   
00152   hdf_status = Vend(file_id);
00153   if (hdf_status == FAIL)
00154     MTK_ERR_CODE_JUMP(MTK_HDF_VEND_FAILED);
00155   vstart_active = 0;
00156   
00157   /* Copy list to output arguments */
00158   *nblockmeta = temp_count;
00159 
00160   *blockmetalist = (char**)malloc(temp_count * sizeof(char*));
00161   if (*blockmetalist == NULL)
00162     MTK_ERR_CODE_JUMP(MTK_MALLOC_FAILED);
00163 
00164   for (i = 0; i < temp_count; ++i)
00165     (*blockmetalist)[i] = temp_list[i];
00166 
00167   free(temp_list);
00168 
00169   return MTK_SUCCESS;
00170   
00171 ERROR_HANDLE:
00172   if (vdata_id != FAIL)
00173     VSdetach(vdata_id);
00174 
00175   if (vstart_active)
00176     Vend(file_id);
00177 
00178   MtkStringListFree(temp_count, &temp_list);
00179   
00180   return status_code;
00181 }
